answers.answer: If you drink water too fast it will literally just go straight through you. My mom and I had to both get put on an IV because we couldn't retain any fluids during pregnancy and got badly dehydrated. Try drinking Gatorade, it might work a little better.
It could also mean gestational diabetes. Consult your doctor.

question: Ok I'm constantly feeling dehydrated no matter how much water I drink :( I keep drinking it and still feel like I need more cause my throat is all dry. Has this happened to anyone or is it just me? Oh and I'm barely going to be 11 weeks.
title: dehydrated?
